imdb.plot outline: Live @ the Ford presents four live performances that celebrate the ways in which music and dance can cross boundaries and bring diverse audiences together in the historic Ford Amphitheater in Los Angeles. The celebration of border cowboy and vaquero culture by Grandeza Mexicana; the marriage of east and west through the music of Korea's Haegum Plus and dance crew Last for One.
imdb.title: Live @ the Ford
plot: _Live @ the Ford_ (qv) presents four live performances that celebrate the ways in which music and dance can cross boundaries and bring diverse audiences togetherin the historic Ford Amphitheater in Los Angeles.

_Live @ the Ford_ (qv) presents four live performances that celebrate the ways in which music and dance can cross boundaries and bring diverse audiences together in the historic Ford Amphitheater in Los Angeles. The celebration of border cowboy and vaquero culture by Grandeza Mexicana; the marriage of east and west through the music of Korea's Haegum Plus and dance crew Last for One.
